sentences.english: Then, at about 10 a.m., J.P. Morgan suddenly withdrew its offer.

sentences.english: Lewis Morgenstern, who led the study, said in a statement.
sentences.chinese: 领导此研究的博士摩根史丹在一项声明中表示。

sentences.english: There have been no noticeable manipulative takedown attempts by JP Morgan.

sentences.chinese: 摩根史腾在给路透社的电邮回复中说。

sentences.english: For the first time, it's poised to surpass both Goldman Sachs and Morgan Stanley in the lucrative M&A business.
sentences.chinese: 在兼并重组业务方面上它超过了高盛和摩根士丹利。

sentences.chinese: 摩根，你昨晚挨到什么时候才上床？
